```{r}
load("B_final.Rdata")
source("shared_code/data_cleaning.R")
library(tidyverse)
##lm model:
working_dt <- dt_for5

#regress on beta_0:
y0 = B_final[1:691,1]
month = 
  working_dt %>% 
  dplyr::select(id, month) %>% 
  pull(month)
year = 
  working_dt %>% 
  dplyr::select(id, year) %>% 
  pull(year)
type = 
  working_dt %>% 
  dplyr::select(id, type) %>% 
  pull(type)

season = 
  working_dt %>% 
  dplyr::select(id, season) %>% 
  pull(season)

lm_b0_year = lm(y0 ~ month + year + type)
lm_b0_season = lm(y0 ~ season + year + type)
summary(lm_b0_year)
summary(lm_b0_season)
```
## B1

```{r}
#regress on beta_1:
y1 = B_final[1:691,2]
lm_b1 = lm(y1 ~ factor(month) + year + factor(type))
summary(lm_b1)
```
